p: The culture confirmed TB positives were then characterized with Genotype MTBC. Samples positive for AFB on the ZN stain and negative for Mycobacterium TB complex on the SD-Bioline were further sub-cultured on Lowenstein Johnson (LJ) medium for a maximum of 42 days. A positive growth on LJ was followed by Genotype CM and AS Hain line probe assays (Hains Life science, Nehren, Germany) to isolate and characterize non-tuberculous mycobacterium present in the culture as outlined in Fig 1 and previously reported.[ 37]
